Package datastorage

Class TreatmentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastorage.DAOimp<Treatment>
      • datastorage.TreatmentDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO<Treatment>
    public class TreatmentDAO
extends DAOimp<Treatment>
    Implements the Interface DAOImp. Overrides methods to generate specific patient-SQL-queries.
